00074 #ifndef __STCLIENTPAGEMANAGER_H
00075 #define __STCLIENTPAGEMANAGER_H
00076 
00077 #include  <arboretum/stPageServer.h>
00078 #include  <arboretum/stTypes.h>
00079 #include  <arboretum/stPage.h>
00080 
00092 class stClientPageManager: public stPageManager{
00093    public:
00101       stClientPageManager(int clientID, stPageServer * server){
00102          myID = clientID;
00103          this->server = server;
00104       }//end stClientPageManager
00105 
00113       virtual bool IsEmpty(){
00114          return server->GetPageCount(myID) == 1;
00115       }//end IsEmpty
00116 
00134       virtual stPage * GetHeaderPage(){
00135          return GetPage(headerID);
00136       }//end GetHeaderPage
00137 
00152       virtual stPage * GetPage(stPageID pageid){
00153          UpdateReadCounter();
00154          return server->GetPage(myID, pageid);
00155       }//end GetPage
00156 
00171       virtual void ReleasePage(stPage * page){
00172          return server->ReleasePage(myID, page);
00173       }//end ReleasePage
00174 
00187       virtual stPage * GetNewPage(){
00188          return server->GetNewPage(myID);
00189       }//end GetNewPage
00190 
00200       virtual void WritePage(stPage * page){
00201          server->WritePage(myID, page);
00202       }//end WritePage
00203 
00214       virtual void DisposePage(stPage * page){
00215          server->DisposePage(myID, page);
00216       }//end DisposePage
00217 
00222       virtual stSize GetMinimumPageSize(){
00223          return server->GetPageSize();
00224       }//end GetMinimumPageSize
00225 
00229       int GetClientID(){
00230          return myID;
00231       }//end GetClientID
00232 
00236       stPageServer * GetServer(){
00237          return server;
00238       }//end GetServer
00239    private:
00243       stPageID headerID;
00244 
00248       int myID;
00249 
00253       stPageServer * server;
00254 };//end stPageServer
00255 
00256 #endif //__STPAGESERVER_H
